xpath.p:
Please note that:
Invoices will only be merged if:
* Invoices are in state 'draft'.
* Invoices belong to the same partner.
* Invoices have the same company, partner, address, currency, journal, salesman, account, type, fiscal partner_bank, position and payment mode.
Lines will only be merged if:
* Invoice lines are exactly the same except for the product, quantity and unit.
